quote: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart.
author: José N. Harris

quote: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word 'happy' would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: There is some kind of a sweet innocence in being human – in not having to be just happy or just sad – in the nature of being able to be both broken and whole, at the same time.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Grief can be the garden of compassion. If you keep your heart open through everything, your pain can become your greatest ally.
author: Rumi

quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
author: Jean de La Bruyère

quote: Speak when you are angry, and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Anger is like a storm rising up from the bottom of your consciousness. When you feel it coming, turn your focus to your breath.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
author: Buddha

quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The best fighter is never angry.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
author: Confucius

quote: Do not let anger drive you. Let wisdom lead the way.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Love is not what you say. Love is what you do.
author: Unknown

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

quote: Let us always meet each other with a smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: Life is full of surprises, and the biggest one of all is learning what you’re capable of.
author: Unknown

quote: Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us.
author: Boris Pasternak

quote: Embrace the unexpected. Find magic in the surprising moments.
author: Unknown

quote: The greatest thing in life is not to have everything but to find surprises in every little thing.
author: Unknown

quote: What is life but a series of inspired follies?
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Sometimes, the most ordinary things can be made extraordinary, simply by doing them with the right people.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Be open to the unexpected. That's where joy often lives.
author: Unknown

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Do the thing you fear, and the death of fear is certain.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Fear has its use, but cowardice has none.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Fear is only as deep as the mind allows.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Your largest fear carries your greatest growth.
author: Unknown

quote: Joy is not in things; it is in us.
author: Richard Wagner

quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: We choose joy in the simplest of moments.
author: Unknown

quote: Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Let your joy burst forth like flowers in the spring.
author: Unknown

quote: A joyful heart is the inevitable result of a heart burning with love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Joy multiplies when it is shared among friends.
author: Unknown
